org.bytedeco.arrow

Class ExecContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.arrow.ExecContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    @Namespace(value="arrow::compute")
 @NoOffset
 @Properties(inherit=arrow.class)
public class ExecContext
extends Pointer
    \brief Context for expression-global variables and options used by function evaluation
